FuncDef: This command specifies the number of consecutive OAM loopback attempts that must succeed after the periodic attempt before the endpoint will transition the state to up.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of successful loopback replies before an ATM VC goes up. Values-0 to 10 (A zero value means that the endpoint will transition to the up state immediately if the periodic loopback attempt succeeds.). ParamDefault: Default- 2
